data.benefits: Scheme provides 75% reimbursement (up to Rs. 1 Lakhs) for expenses incurred on safety audit and subsidy on cost of capital equipment and capital expenditure required for undertaking safety measures, subject to a maximum of Rs. 20 lakhs.
data.eligibility: All MSME existing anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.conditions:
The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes. 

The product manufactured should not fall under the restrictive list notified by the State Government. 

Only investments in new equipment and other safety-enhancing requirements are eligible for subsidy. 

The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 

The unit should be in commercial production. 

The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.beneficiaries: All MSME existing anywhere in the state are eligible under this scheme.
data.prerequisites:
The unit must have filed Udyam Registration Certificate (URC) and Haryana Udyam Memorandum (HUM) for statistical purposes. 

The product manufactured should not fall under the restrictive list notified by the State Government. 

Only investments in new equipment and other safety-enhancing requirements are eligible for subsidy. 

The unit must obtain No objection certificate from the competent authority, if applicable. 

The unit should be in commercial production. 

The unit must be in regular production at the time of disbursement.
data.nodal_agency: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.context: In supersession of the Enterprises Promotion Policy, 2015, the Governor of Haryana notified the ‘Haryana Enterprises & Employment Policy-2020’  as Annexure-‘A’, which is effective from 01st January, 2021.
data.objective: To promote safety audit which is a tool that can be utilized to improve safety and attitudes in the workplace.
data.description:
Scheme provides reimbursement as follows: Safety Audit: 75% reimbursement of safety audit expenses, upto Rs.1 lakh Capital Equipment/Subsidy for Safety Measures: 

A Category: 50% subsidy on cost of capital equipment and capital expenditure for safety measures, upto Rs.5 lakhs in every 5 years. 

B Category: 50% subsidy on cost of capital equipment and capital expenditure for safety measures, upto Rs.10 lakhs in every 5 years. 

C Category: 50% subsidy on cost of capital equipment and capital expenditure for safety measures, upto Rs.15 lakhs in every 5 years. 

D Category: 50% subsidy on cost of capital equipment and capital expenditure for safety measures, upto Rs.20 lakhs in every 5 years.
data.how_to_apply:
The application form (Annexure-I) for reimbursement of safety audit and capital equipment expenses should be submitted along with the required documents to the Director General, Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises, through the department's web portal.
Annexure-I: https://cdnbbsr.s3waas.gov.in/s3f48c04ffab49ff0e5d1176244fdfb65c/uploads/2022/06/2022060276.pdf
data.funding_facilitator: Directorate of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises, Haryana
data.funding_mechanism: The applicant will get the benefits after the approval from the concerned auhtority.
data.additional_info:
Link of list of Restrictive Industries in Haryana: https://www.hsiidc.org.in/uploads/estate_managements/170097742718HEEP%20restrictive%20list.pdf
Categorization of Blocks : https://investharyana.in/content/pdfs/Re-categorization%20of%20blocks%2015.11.2018.pdf
data.checklist_info_a:
Udyam Registration Certificate (URC)
Haryana Udhyam Memorandum (HUM)
NOC/CLU (No Objection Certificate/Change of Land Use)
Haryana Resident Certificate (for local employment benefits)
ESI/PF Registration Number
Proof of Commercial Production
Financial Statements (Balance Sheet, Profit & Loss Statement)
Import-Exporter Code (IEC)
Registration-cum-Membership Certificate (RCMC) from Export Promotion Council
Land Documents (ownership or lease agreement)
Environmental Clearances (if applicable)
Zero Defect Zero Effect (ZED) Certification
Proof of Investment (in machinery/equipment)
Electricity Bills (for electricity-related incentives)
Energy Audit Report (for energy efficiency claims)
Other Miscellaneous Documents (as per specific schemes)
data.checklist_info_d:
Address :  Sh. Deepak Burak , Directorate of MSME
Phone No: 8699888828

data.beneficiary: All Industry - All Entities - Haryana- All MSMEs
